turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm wanting to get a Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay great. whipped cream or none?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipped cream and can I also get 1% milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great so that's a venti caffe latte with 2% milk. which starbucks did you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Main Street in downtown Chicago.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. I'll place the order with the one on Main street. It'll be ready for pickup soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'd be all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. You'll get your receipt via text.
